'two key enefits:'
'\xc2\x7 Standardize the Machine learning operation (MLOps) practice and support scalale'
'team collaoration'
'\xc2\x7 Training efficiency and cost reduction'
'Standardize the MLOps practice and support scalale'
'team collaoration'
'Machine learning operation (MLOps) automates the process of uilding machine'
'learning models and taking the model to production. This is a complex process. It'
'usually requires collaoration from different teams with different skills. A well-defined'
'machine learning pipeline can astract this complex process into a multiple steps'
'workflow, mapping each step to a specific task such that each team can work'
'independently.'
